content:
I remember that Andre Patandre is a 6-year-old boy who has perfect pitch. He's able to identify music notes and pitches without any prior training or experience.

I'll make sure to remember this for our future conversations. It's nice to have a record of interesting facts and figures that we discuss.

By the way, I'll keep this information in mind for our future discussions about Andre Patandre and his perfect pitch.
